src_original: sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkha sthānīyeṣu ca dharme ṣvanāghātaḥ /
kuśale cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ sannāhe vā prayoge vā alīnatve vā avyāvṛttau vā asantuṣṭau vā /  kuśalapakṣaparipūraṇapariniṣpādanakarmakam //
teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmiṃ stasmin sattvanikāye ātmabhāvasadṛśatāyāṃ nikāyasabhāga iti prajñaptiḥ //
vyañjanakāyāḥ katameḥ tadubhayāśrayeṣvakṣareṣu vyañjanakāyā iti prajñaptiḥ /
varṇo 'pi saḥ /  arthasaṃvarṇanatāmupādāya /  akṣare punaḥ paryāyākṣaraṇatāmupādāya //
